vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Κλωπᾶς, -ᾶ, ὁ (Aram.; on the original, see Lft., Gal., 267 f.),
Clopas: Jhn.19:25.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the New Testament, only mentioned at Luk.24.18; married to Mary (G3137K); also called Clopas (KJV: Cleophas) at Jhn.19.25;
§ Clopas
Cleopas, (Proper name), Jn. 19:25*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
革羅罷 这个陽性專有名詞在亞蘭文的意思是 "我的交易"
小雅各的父親, 即耶穌母親的妹夫 (耶穌母親的妹妹馬利亞的丈夫) (約 19:25)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
革罗罢 这个阳性专有名词在亚兰文的意思是 "我的交易"
小雅各的父亲, 即耶稣母亲的妹夫 (耶稣母亲的妹妹马利亚的丈夫) (约 19:25)
